actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide assistance with elementary and secondary educational costs to parents of children with disabilities.
short_title: Help and Opportunities for Parents of Exceptional Children Act of 2003

summary.text: Help and Opportunities for Parents of Exceptional Children Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an annual tax credit of up to $3,000 (with adjustments for inflation) per year for the qualified elementary or secondary education expenses of a dependent child with a disability.Includes private, parochial, religious, or home schools among qualified educational institutions.

titles.title: Help and Opportunities for Parents of Exceptional Children Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide assistance with elementary and secondary educational costs to parents of children with disabilities.
